column1: For the sea areas in between 20N - 10S and 60E-100E
(Issued at 07.00 a.m. on 09 June 2024, for next 24hours)

S
ea areas around the Island
Several spells of showers will occur in the sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam to
Hambantota via Colombo and Galle. Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in
the other sea areas around the island.
Winds will be south-westerly and wind speed will be (30-40) kmph.

W
ind speed may increase up to (55-65) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending
from Trincomalee to Puttalam via Kankasanthurai, Mannar and from Hambantota to Batticaloa
The  sea  areas  off  the  coasts  extending  from  Trincomalee  to  Puttalam  via  Kankasanthurai,
Mannar and from Hambantota to Batticaloa via Pottuvil can be rough at times.
